sentences.english: Battelle asks if Yahoo is talking to Microsoft about any kind of deal.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立问雅虎是否在跟微软商讨某项交易。

sentences.english: That puts the stock on a still-heady multiple of 23 times earnings.
sentences.chinese: 以这一股价折算的雅虎预期市盈率仍然高达23倍。

sentences.english: Yet even industry doormats Yahoo (YHOO, Fortune 500) and AOL are profitable.
sentences.chinese: 即便万年老二雅虎和AOL都在盈利。

sentences.english: This will give Yahoo direct and indirect ownership of 37 per cent of Alibaba.com.
sentences.chinese: 此举将令雅虎直接和间接持有阿里巴巴37%的股权。

sentences.english: Yahoo - Yahoo was the Google of 2000.
sentences.chinese: 现在的雅虎就是2000年的谷歌。

sentences.english: Yahoo Shopping is the best place to comparison shop de, director of small piezoelectric alarms.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎购物是最好的地方比较小商店棣导演压电警报器。

sentences.english: Even with Yahoo's help, Microsoft still has its work cut out.
sentences.chinese: 即使在雅虎的帮助下，微软仍然有大量问题亟待解决。

sentences.english: From the Tower of Babel comes Yahoo Babel Fish.
sentences.chinese: 来自于巴别塔的雅虎宝贝鱼翻译工具。

sentences.english: Yahoo now has a digital subscriber-line partnership with AT&T.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎现在与AT&T就数字用户线结成伙伴关系。

sentences.english: The content of Meme is not created or conceived by Yahoo! Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: Meme的内容不由雅虎东南亚发布，也不归其所有。

sentences.english: Yahoo rejected Microsoft's offer, saying it "substantially undervalues" the company.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎拒绝了微软的提议，称它“大大低估”的公司。

sentences.english: But my point is that Silver Lake could afford Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 但我的观点是，银湖买得起雅虎。

sentences.english: He expects Yahoo to be compensated for the move.
sentences.chinese: 他期望雅虎公司能够因该变动得到补偿。

sentences.english: Yahoo also has a data center in Quincy.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎也有一个在昆西的数据中心。

sentences.english: You need to be reachable on Yahoo! Messenger while doing the job.
sentences.chinese: 您需要在雅虎通可达而做的工作。

sentences.english: Page is indexed and cached by Google, Yahoo, Bing within last 45 days.
sentences.chinese: 索引页是由谷歌，雅虎，冰缓存内的最后45天。

definition: Google, Internet company and search engine
Baidu, Internet portal and search engine, www.baidu.com, listed as BIDU on NASDAQ since 1999
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
Time Warner Inc., US media company
